results.content:
Yes, perfect match so far at halfway mark.  Getting to learn lot of valuable information.  Very clearly explained by Mr. Aranha.

(course completion review):
Awesome.  Thanks to Mr. Aranha's clear explanation, i, a newbie, could not only code along and have a functioning, real-time 'grocery app' but also get to experience at least a fraction of the thrill "real developers" experience.    Along the way I got introduced to different ways of creating servers (http, connect, express), MongoDB NoSQL Database, including creating an online mLab database account, and using socket.io to broadcast messages to all connected clients in realtime.

Thanks a lot, Mr. Aranha, for sharing your knowledge with us, and i sincerely wish you all the best for all your future endeavors.

results.content: Regarding the Project part , It was difficult grasping all of that and remembering the syntax for beginners like me who dont know all modules and all objects and functions , a separate section for important syntax was expected describing how various important npm modules, commands,functions,objects etc work and what are the options available !

results.content: Good explanation & easy to understand. Thanks

This is a short hands-on of node.js/express/socket.io/mongoose.
The explanation is not in detail but you could write a program having interesting features.

Thank you for this course!
